Reference

All functions

Config-class

Config objects are specialized list objects

Project-class

Portable Encapsulated Project object

Project()

The constructor of a class representing a Portable Encapsulated Project

activateSubproject(<Project>,<character>)

Activate other subproject in objects of Project class

config(<Project>)

View PEP config of the object of Project class

.isAbsolute()

Determine whether a path is absolute.

.makeAbsPath()

Create an absolute path from a primary target and a parent candidate.

expandPath()

Expand system path

getSubsample(<Project>,<character>,<character>)

This method extracts the subsample from the Project object

listSubprojects()

Lists subprojects in a config file

listifyDF()

Listify data frame columns

loadConfig()

Load the config of a PEP

pepr

Package docs

printNestedList()

Print a nested list

samples(<Project>)

View samples in the objects of Project class

strformat()

Format a string like python's format function
